creditline: Gift of the Mitchell Hutchinson Collection
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two small hills with trees emerge from LLC; open expanse of water at middle ground, a small village lies beyond in a mist-filled valley; hazy mountains loom above, lowest two have a path, stairs (?), between

title: Untitled [Village in a Misty Valley]
